PSIAMS Systems

PSIAMS Systems: Project Manager (Salesforce CRM)
10/3/2015 – 30/10/2016

Main Responsibilities: Managing day to day CRM duties such as, data cleaning, support tickets, recommending new technology and system enhancements. Managing annual budget, keeping it in line with directions from finance. Driving my team forward in day to day support and maintenance. Management of local and remote users.
